column4: hi, how can I make an application to use ALSA instead of a direct access to the sound device (/dev/dsp)
if the app itself can't use alsa, you can try the alsa-oss wrapper which tries to fool OSS (/dev/dsp)-using apps to use ALSA nevertheless
